welcome_message_body: Welcome to Papeete, the charming capital of French Polynesia! Known for its vibrant markets, stunning waterfront, and rich culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Le Soufflé
restaurants.description: Le Soufflé is a french restaurant located in Papeete.
restaurants.address: Rue Gauguin, Papeete Îles du Vent

restaurants.name: Le Sully
restaurants.description: Le Sully is a french restaurant located in Papeete.
restaurants.address: Avenue du Maréchal Foch (En face de l'ancien Bip bip burger du Liberty), 98713 Papeete Îles du Vent

restaurants.description: Le Velvet Restaurant is a french restaurant located in Papeete.
restaurants.address: Avenue Du Prince Hinoi, Papeete Îles du Vent

restaurants.name: Snack Lagon Bleu
restaurants.description: Snack Lagon Bleu is a american restaurant located in Papeete.
restaurants.address: Chemin vicinal de Taunoa (Patutoa-servitude Lucas), 98714 Papeete Îles du Vent

restaurants.name: Pescadou

restaurants.address: Rue Anne-Marie Javouhey (Passage Cardella), Papeete Îles du Vent
